name: Dragons vs Dwarves
description:
You start with 100 gold each level. The gold pile produces more gold for you to use. The rock stops most of the dwarves. The blue dragon bites attackers. The purple dragon fires a fire ball at enemies.

This game has 10 levels. Every time the levels are different with a randomized dwarf spawner!

New In Version 2.0 (Published 2018/02/22):

  • Level indicator
  • Currency text fix and allowing currency past 999
  • Limited playing field so player can no longer put defenders past a certain point
  • Different level gold piles as you progress through the game
  • Edited health, damage, and costs to make the game harder

Coming soon:

  • High score screen
  • Different difficulties (currently the difficulty bar in options doesn't work)
  • Pause menu
  • Added graphics
  • And more! Please let me know what I can do to make this game better!

Controls:
Use your mouse to place down defenders anywhere on the playing field.
